languages.text: "Напрасно мы позволили отступникам уйти. Надо было прикончить их за ослушание. Что теперь подумают о Вольном Торговце прочие слуги?"
"We should not have let them leave. We should have killed them for their disobedience. What will the other servants think of the Rogue Trader now?"
languages.original_text: "Напрасно мы позволили отступникам уйти. Надо было прикончить их за ослушание. Что теперь подумают о Вольном Торговце прочие слуги?"

traits.locale_text: "We should not have let them leave. We should have killed them for their disobedience. What will the other servants think of the Rogue Trader now?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We should not have let them leave. We should have killed them for their disobedience. What will the other servants think of the Rogue Trader now?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We should not have let them leave. We should have killed them for their disobedience. What will the other servants think of the Rogue Trader now?"

traits.locale_text: "We should not have let them leave. We should have killed them for their disobedience. What will the other servants think of the Rogue Trader now?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “我们不该就那么放他们走，应该因为他们的反抗行为杀了他们。现在，别的喽啰会怎么看待行商浪人？”
languages.original_text: "We should not have let them leave. We should have killed them for their disobedience. What will the other servants think of the Rogue Trader now?"

traits.locale_text: “我们不该就那么放他们走，应该因为他们的反抗行为杀了他们。现在，别的喽啰会怎么看待行商浪人？”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Nous n'aurions pas dû les laisser partir. Ils auraient dû être exécutés pour insubordination. Que vont penser les autres serviteurs {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, maintenant ? »
languages.original_text: "We should not have let them leave. We should have killed them for their disobedience. What will the other servants think of the Rogue Trader now?"

traits.locale_text: « Nous n'aurions pas dû les laisser partir. Ils auraient dû être exécutés pour insubordination. Que vont penser les autres serviteurs {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, maintenant ? »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «No deberíamos haber dejado que se fueran. Deberíamos haberles matado por su desobediencia. ¿Qué pensarán los otros sirvientes de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente?».
languages.original_text: "We should not have let them leave. We should have killed them for their disobedience. What will the other servants think of the Rogue Trader now?"

traits.locale_text: «No deberíamos haber dejado que se fueran. Deberíamos haberles matado por su desobediencia. ¿Qué pensarán los otros sirvientes de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente?».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「やつらを放っておくべきじゃなかったな。造反を理由に殺しておくべきだった。他の従者は今ごろ自由開拓者について何て言ってるんだろうな？」
languages.original_text: "We should not have let them leave. We should have killed them for their disobedience. What will the other servants think of the Rogue Trader now?"

traits.locale_text: 「やつらを放っておくべきじゃなかったな。造反を理由に殺しておくべきだった。他の従者は今ごろ自由開拓者について何て言ってるんだろうな？」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Wir hätten sie nicht gehen lassen dürfen. Wir hätten sie für ihren Ungehorsam töten sollen. Was werden die anderen Diener {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} jetzt denken?"
languages.original_text: "We should not have let them leave. We should have killed them for their disobedience. What will the other servants think of the Rogue Trader now?"

traits.locale_text: "Wir hätten sie nicht gehen lassen dürfen. Wir hätten sie für ihren Ungehorsam töten sollen. Was werden die anderen Diener {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} jetzt denken?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "We should not have let them leave. We should have killed them for their disobedience. What will the other servants think of the Rogue Trader now?"

languages.text: "Gitmelerine izin vermemeliydik. İtaatsizlikleri yüzünden onları öldürmeliydik. Şimdi diğer hizmetkârlar, Hür Tacir hakkında ne düşünür?"
languages.original_text: "We should not have let them leave. We should have killed them for their disobedience. What will the other servants think of the Rogue Trader now?"

traits.locale_text: "Gitmelerine izin vermemeliydik. İtaatsizlikleri yüzünden onları öldürmeliydik. Şimdi diğer hizmetkârlar Hür Tacir hakkında ne düşünecek?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
